items.title: Relaxation Massage
items.description: Delight in a full body relaxation massage using a collection of techniques that will help you immediately unwind, de-stress, increase blood flow and movement, reduce tension, and help you to feel balanced and calm. Pressure tailored to your needs.

items.title: Hot Stone
items.description: Extend the benefits of your massage with a soothing hot stone treatment incorporating warm basalt stones to quiet the mind, aid in the release of muscle tension, and calm the nervous system. Allow the heat of the stones to work deeply into the muscle, softening and melting away any tension and tight areas of the body.

items.title: Sensaura Signature Facial
items.description: Deeply relaxing and rejuvenating, our signature facial has it all, with an abundance of massage including the face, neck, decolletage and scalp, along with an organic rich facial that will visibly improve the tone and texture of your skin. You will drift away and be in complete bliss! A guest favourite!

items.title: Relax and Restore
items.description: Restore your body with a relaxation massage followed by our signature facial. You will feel magnificent from the inside out after this treatment. The best of both worlds!

items.title: Nurture and Nourish
items.description: Feel nurtured with a soothing foot ritual, and then indulge in a deeply relaxing warm stone back massage. A nourishing signature facial including a face, neck, shoulder, and scalp massage will follow. Complete your experience with a cheese and fruit platter and a complimentary glass of sparkling wine or juice, to be enjoyed on our tranquil and tropical balcony.

items.title: RELAXATION
items.description: Delight in a full body relaxation massage using a collection of techniques that will help you immediately unwind, de-stress, increase blood flow and movement, reduce tension, and help you to feel balanced and calm. Pressure tailored to your needs.

items.title: REMEDIAL
items.description: Unwind tightness from your tender and stiff muscles, target specific problem areas, release chronic tension, and increase blood flow. Assists in the recovery from the injuries of everyday life.

items.title: HOT STONE
items.description: Extend the benefits of your massage with a soothing hot stone treatment incorporating warm basalt stones to quiet the mind, aid in the release of muscle tension, and calm the nervous system. Allow the heat of the stones to work deeply into the muscle, softening and melting away any tension and tight areas of the body.

items.title: AYURVEDIC ABHYANGA
items.description: Drawing from ancient healing rituals of Ayurveda, this treatment is designed for complete relaxation and restoration. A consultation with your therapist will aid in the selection of an Ayurvedic medicated oil and massage techniques, to suit your body type or condition. The warmth and herbal benefits of the oil will penetrate the deeper layers of the body’s tissues, and nervous system to truly calm the mind.

items.title: LYMPHATIC
items.description: A very light massage pressure using sequenced techniques that encourages stimulation of lymph fluid and removal of toxins. Assists in recharging your immune system, fluid retention, swelling and fatigue. Great for boosting your immunity and promoting healing and recovery.

items.title: MUM-TO-BE
items.description: A gentle style of massage designed to relieve the pains and strains of pregnancy, enhance the function of muscles and joints, improve circulation, and ease mental and physical fatigue. You will feel well supported with the use of a pregnancy massage cushion, allowing you to lay on your much desired front once again. Suitable for 2nd and 3rd trimesters only.

items.title: REFLEXOLOGY
items.description: An ancient, natural healing massage therapy designed for the whole being. Pressure upon various reflex points in the feet are applied, allowing toxins to be released and balance restored. Emerge feeling deeply rested and renewed.

items.title: MASSAGE FOR TWO
items.description: Enjoy a heavenly massage for two in the comfort of our double treatment room. Take time to embrace wellness on a romantic retreat, a girl’s getaway, or for a family bonding treat.
items.byline: **Any massage can be selected. Just mention you are booking our double room

items.title: RAINFOREST RENEWAL
items.description: Liberate the senses combining luxurious rainforest native rosella, quandong, Davidson plum and coconut infused body scrub. Together with a cleansing mini facial and a soothe the mind, tension releasing head massage, will continue your experience. Follow with a shower to refreshen the skin and finish with a body lotion application enriched with finger lime caviar to leave your skin feeling smooth, soft, and glowing with renewed radiance.
items.byline: Full Body Exfoliation – Mini Facial – Head Massage - Body Hydration

items.title: OCEAN BLISS VOLCANIC MINERAL
items.description: Regenerate and invigorate the body with a full body exfoliation and a deeply cleansing, warming and anti- inflammatory body mask, infusing calming marine botanicals, purifying clay, seaweed and magnesium salts. Designed to boost circulation, prevent dryness, and soften and even skin tone. Relax cocooned in a natural body wrap whilst enjoying a mini facial and a luxurious head massage. Complete your treatment with a refreshing shower and a nourishing body lotion application, enriched with Australian botanicals and sea minerals. This blissful journey will leave your whole being looking and feeling revitalised.
items.byline: Full Body Exfoliation – Clay Mask – Body Wrap – Mini Facial – Head Massage – Body Hydration

items.title: BALANCING HAIR & SCALP TREAT
items.description: Revive your follicles with balancing oils to bring the whole body back into harmony. A warm and luxurious aromatic hair and scalp elixir is applied, incorporating various massage techniques, to reduce stress and tension of the scalp, while the conditioning treatment works its magic. Indulge in a deeply relaxing neck, and shoulder massage to reduce the busy mind. Stimulates hair growth, restores lustre and moisture, leaving the hair silky soft and full of life.
items.byline: Hair Elixir - Neck and Shoulder Massage - Acupressure Scalp Massage

items.title: DRY BODY BUFF
items.description: A must add-on to any body treatment with a range of incredible benefits. Dry body brushing invigorates the skin, encourages circulation, removes dead skin cells and flaky skin, aids in the removal of toxins, unclogs pores, supports digestion, promotes lymphatic flow, and will leave the skin feeling softer and smoother.
items.byline: This can be added on to any body treatment

items.title: SKIN RENEWAL
items.description: Cleanse, exfoliate and hydrate, this facial will leave your skin feeling refreshed and renewed. Perfect as an add on to any massage or body treatment or just as enjoyable on its own.

items.title: SENSAURA SIGNATURE
items.description: Deeply relaxing and rejuvenating, our signature facial has it all, with an abundance of massage including the face, neck, decolletage and scalp, along with an organic rich facial that will visibly improve the tone and texture of your skin. You will drift away and be in complete bliss! A guest favourite!

items.title: GUA SHA GLOW
items.description: Combining the ancient techniques of Gua Sha with high performance organic skincare suited to your personal needs. Your experience begins with moisture quenching products in combination with a healing stone which glides over the skin with lymphatic drainage technique to visibly lift, tone, brighten and revitalise the complexion. Enjoy a scalp, hand, foot, and the ultimate facial massage throughout your facial journey. A result driven facial where you will equally feel pampered and plump.

items.title: EYE INSPIRE
items.description: Brightens and lifts the eye area, this treatment decongests puffy, tired eyes, visibly improving the appearance. Smooths away fine lines and conceals dark circles. A specially formulated mineral mask draws out stagnant toxins accumulated around the eye area, along with key acupressure point massage. A restoring treatment for anyone suffering from stress, jet lag, allergies, lack of sleep or too much screen time.
items.byline: This can be added on to any facial treatment

items.title: ME-TIME MANICURE
items.description: An intensive treatment for the hands beginning with a softening hand bath and a gentle hand exfoliation, nail shaping and buffing, cuticle care, and a relaxing hand and arm massage to reveal softer and smoother hands. Finish with your favourite splash of colour and a mini neck massage while your paint dries. Includes a non- toxic, vegan, and cruelty-free polish to keep!

items.title: FEET RETREAT
items.description: Immerse your feet in a relaxing footbath and enjoy a stimulating foot exfoliation. You will leave walking on air after nail shaping and buffing, cuticle care, and a nourishing foot massage. Finish with your favourite splash of colour and a mini neck massage while your paint dries. Includes a non-toxic, vegan, and cruelty-free polish to keep!

items.title: TOP TO TOE
items.description: Combining our Me-Time Manicure and Feet Retreat. Drift away with a tension releasing scalp and neck massage, and you will leave relaxed and renewed with fingers and toes looking fabulous. Includes a non-toxic, vegan, and cruelty-free polish to keep!

items.title: FOOT SOOTHER
items.description: Soothe tired feet and feel grounded with a softening foot soak, an energising exfoliant and a relaxing foot massage. **can be added to any treatment

items.title: PARAFFIN WAX TREATMENT
items.description: The perfect finish for your hands or feet to reduce joint stiffness, improve elasticity and deeply infuse moisture, leaving incredibly silky smooth and soft skin. Especially ideal for dry, cracked hands and feet
items.byline: This can be added on to any foot treatment

items.title: RELAX AND GLOW
items.description: Feel the tension easing away from your body and mind with our massage and facial combo. The perfect treatment for the lovers of both, which fits perfectly into any busy schedule.

items.title: RELAX AND RESTORE
items.description: Restore your body with a relaxation massage followed by our signature facial. You will feel magnificent from the inside out after this treatment. The best of both worlds!

items.title: NURTURE AND NOURISH
items.description: Feel nurtured with a soothing foot ritual, and then indulge in a deeply relaxing warm stone back massage. A nourishing signature facial including a face, neck, shoulder, and scalp massage will follow. Complete your experience with a cheese and fruit platter and a complimentary glass of sparkling wine or juice, to be enjoyed on our tranquil and tropical balcony.
items.byline: Foot Ritual – Hot Stone Back Massage – Sensaura Signature Facial – Cheese & Fruit Platter - Refreshments

items.title: BODY REVIVAL
items.description: A body buff will commence your revival with an essential oil blended exfoliant. Bliss out with a relaxation massage followed by a mini facial and scalp massage to complete your renewed self. The perfect treatment to rejuvenate the body and mind.
items.byline: Full Body Exfoliation - Relaxation Massage - Mini Facial – Scalp Massage

items.title: MUM-TO-BE-JOURNEY
items.description: Time to nurture and support you and your growing baby. Take time out by relaxing with our signature pregnancy tea, while your feet are immersed in a warming and soothing foot bath. A foot massage is performed to relieve any tension and swelling. Melt into a massage designed specifically for the needs of prenatal women, relaxing tense muscles and easing the mind. Complete your wellness journey with a mini facial for the ultimate relaxation experience. The perfect combination to take a moment to relax during this special time. Suitable for 2nd and 3rd trimesters
items.byline: Pregnancy Tea – Foot Soak – Foot Massage – Mum-To- Be Massage – Mini Facial – Scalp Massage

items.title: SENSAURA ESCAPE
items.description: Our 1⁄2 day ultimate wellness day out with all our favourite therapies! Designed for anyone who wants to escape from reality and completely unwind and reset. Enjoy some solo self-love or spend quality time with a loved one nurturing your body, mind, and soul. Begin your morning with gentle yoga, breathwork and meditation on our tropical balcony. Ease into the morning with a cup of our signature herbal tea and a light bite to activate your senses and induce relaxation. Your therapist will complete a consultation while you enjoy a soothing foot soak, followed by a foot scrub and massage. An invigorating dry body buff will follow with its incredible benefits from encouraging circulation to leaving the skin feeling soft and smooth. Entirely let go with a relaxation massage to promote calmness, balance, and reduce tension. Awaken to a light lunch and a glass of sparkling wine or juice before enjoying our signature facial including the face, neck, decolletage and scalp to conclude your ultimate wellness escape.
items.byline: Yoga – Breathwork – Meditation – Herbal tea – Refreshments – Foot Soother - Relaxation Massage – Signature Facial – Light Lunch

items.title: RECONNECT AND RECHARGE
items.description: Group Package (Minimum 3). Occasions are for sharing experiences and celebrating meaningful moments in our lives. Whether it is a bridal shower, birthday, team building, Christmas party or a group getaway, we have the perfect package to reconnect and recharge. Unwind with a soothing pot of herbal tea, connect with your mind and body with breathwork and a yoga session, followed by our Foot Soother including a foot soak, scrub and foot massage. Complete your time together with some delicious cheese, fruit and sparkling wine or juice, the perfect way to end your day, enjoyed on our private tropical balcony.
items.byline: Herbal tea – Breathwork & Yoga – Foot Soother – Ref reshments

items.title: YOGA
items.description: Balance and bliss await you at Sensaura Yoga Studio set amongst stunning natural surroundings. Join us in body, mind, and spirit, and you will experience a rejuvenating and mindful practice customised to suit everyone. Our yoga classes combine flowing postures with conscious breath work and focus, to enhance and develop flexibility, body awareness and mental clarity. Leave feeling in balance, at peace and inspired.

items.title: MEDITATION
items.description: Relax and reset with mindful meditation. Our classes provide a supportive and welcoming environment, allowing you to explore various meditation techniques and deepen your practice, whether you’re a beginner or experienced, these classes are designed to guide you on a journey of self-discovery and relaxation. By incorporating mindfulness into your daily life, you can reduce stress, improve focus, and enhance overall well-being. These classes offer an opportunity to disconnect from the outside world and reconnect with yourself.

items.title: REIKI
items.description: A holistic energy healing system created from universal life force energy, that works on the physical, mental, emotional, and spiritual body. Targets stress reduction, which is the beginning of all imbalances. It promotes a deep state of relaxation, the body’s natural ability to heal is activated, with harmonising and balancing the energy centres (chakras). This is a non-invasive form of hands-on healing, where you stay fully clothed.
